imitation_55.name: Perfection
imitation_55.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. When **Fortitude Resonance** is activated, the **A.T. Field** durability is set to at least **30%** of its maximum value.

imitation_54.name: Rising Curtain
imitation_54.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When equipped with **Wicked**, increase final damage by an additional **6%**.

imitation_53.name: Dreams vs. Reality
imitation_53.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
Increase **EP-7000 Skyfire's** flame damage by **30%**.

imitation_52.name: Brilliance
imitation_52.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. When Pactcrest â˜† Metz is equipped, increase final damage by an additional **6%**. When **Benediction Resonance** is active, the additional increase in final damage affects nearby teammates as well. This effect does not stack.

imitation_51.name: Lotus Dance
imitation_51.description: After using **Whirling**, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **4.5%** for **30** seconds.

imitation_51.name: Darkshadow
imitation_51.description: After using **Whirling**, for every **1** flame weapon equipped, increase final damage by **9%** for **30** seconds.

imitation_50.name: Find Oneself
imitation_50.description:
Increase final damage by **12%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is **Onyx Tortoise**, normal attack damage is increased by **30%**.

imitation_50.name: Selfless
imitation_50.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
The Wanderer's base physical ATK is increased to the highest value out of their physical/flame/frost/volt base ATK. When the main slot weapon is **Onyx Tortoise**, normal attack damage is increased by **50%**.

imitation_49.name: Lingering Note
imitation_49.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When **Purple Bamboo** is in the main slot, for every **1** non-altered weapon equipped, increase all elemental damage by **8%**.

imitation_48.name: Synergy
imitation_48.description: Increase volt damage by **6%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped.

imitation_48.name: Enlightenment
imitation_48.description: Increase volt damage by **8%** for every **1** volt weapon equipped. The amount of time that Grayspace Entities are controlled by Seal is increased to **120** seconds.

imitation_46.name: Regulations
imitation_46.description: Increase final damage by **14%**. For every 1 physical weapon equipped, increase normal attack damage of **Equilibrium** by **10%**, up to **20%**.

imitation_46.name: Order
imitation_46.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. When **Equilibrium** is equipped, increase physical damage dealt to targets with less than **80%** of HP by **10%**. For every 1 physical weapon equipped, increase normal attack damage of **Equilibrium** by **20%**, up to **40%**.

imitation_43.name: Overwatching Blade
imitation_43.description: Increase final damage by **13%**. When **Alabaster Tiger** is equipped, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **1%**.

imitation_43.name: Governing Blade
imitation_43.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When **Alabaster Tiger** is equipped, gain damage immunity for **4** seconds when using **Sword Art: Icy Beckon** (unavailable in Apex League). For every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase frost damage by **2.5%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, gain an additional **350** weapon charge after the Wanderer uses any frost weapon skill. After using any frost weapon's skill or discharge other than **Alabaster Tiger's**, deal additional damage equal to **1,456%** of ATK to nearby targets.

imitation_41.name: Bamboo Splints
imitation_41.description:
Increase final damage by **13%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **6%**.

imitation_41.name: Jade Luster
imitation_41.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
When equipped with **3** volt weapons, increase volt damage by **6%**, and crit rate boost duration is additionally extended by **25** seconds.

imitation_38.name: Steady Qi
imitation_38.description:
Increase final damage by **13%**.
While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.
While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming **Fighting Spirit** by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.

imitation_38.name: Attention
imitation_38.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
While in the **Martial Artist** form, additionally increase final damage by **7%**.
While in the **Sweeping Force** form, for every **1** frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming **Fighting Spirit** by **9%**. When **3** frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by **8%**.

imitation_37.name: Counting Ink
imitation_37.description: Increase final damage by **13%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, **Sparrow Feather** launch frequency increases to **1** per second.

imitation_37.name: Taking Up the Brush
imitation_37.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**. When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, **Sparrow Feather** launch frequency increases to **1** per second.
When **Sparrow Feather** hits and triggers the spreading effect, it additionally spreads **Ion Scorch** and **Cross Burn**.
In team play, your damage taken from the aggroed target is reduced by **5%**. When Fortitude Resonance is activated, the damage reduction increases to **8%**.

imitation_36.name: Moon Reflection
imitation_36.description:
Increase final damage by **18%**.
**Scatter Technique Enhancement:**
Hydro Focus Enhancement: Increase all elemental damage by **12%**.
Vortex Enhancement: If **Moonstar Bracelet** is in the main slot, damage caused by Vortex is increased by **30%**.
Torrential Force Enhancement: Increase discharge damage by **12%**.
Maelstrom Enhancement: When dealing physical damage while Maelstrom is in effect, gain an additional final damage boost, up to **33%** (maxes out in 10 seconds).
Aqua Shackles Enhancement: Aqua Prison duration is extended to **5** seconds while Benediction Resonance is active, and Aqua Prison's base resistance reduction is increased to **10%**.
Wellspring Enhancement: Resistance is increased by (**Max HP**/**100,000**)% while Fortitude Resonance is active, for a maximum of **10%**.

imitation_35.name: Hoarfrost
imitation_35.description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **10%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **20%**.

imitation_35.name: Molten Feathers
imitation_35.description: After equipping Precious One, increase final damage by **15%**. While using Precious One, increase shatter by **45%**.

imitation_34.name: Raging Fire
imitation_34.description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **16%**.

imitation_34.name: Towering Flames
imitation_34.description: During Fortitude Resonance, flame and frost damage received by you and your teammates in the Vermilion Domain is reduced by **24%**, and final damage is increased by **8%**.

imitation_32.name: Dimension X
imitation_32.description: Increase final damage by **13%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **18%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

imitation_32.name: Dimension Z
imitation_32.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. Activate by equipping **2** weapons of different elements. Increase final damage by **23%**. Activate by equipping **3** weapons of different elements.

imitation_31.name: Umi: Good Show
imitation_31.description: Increase final damage by **12%** for **30** seconds whenever Umi uses **It's Magic Time**. This effect does not stack.

imitation_31.name: Umi: Grand Performance
imitation_31.description: Increase final damage by **18%** for **30** seconds whenever Umi uses **It's Magic Time**. This effect does not stack.

imitation_30.name: Anisoptera
imitation_30.description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **13%** for **12** seconds.

imitation_30.name: Lepidoptera
imitation_30.description: After successfully using a weapon skill, increase final damage by **18%** for **18** seconds. After Unyielding Wing is advanced to 1 star, receive Alyss's support when using a **physical/flame/volt** weapon skill in the Chilling Field, summoning Alyss to cast a discharge skill on the field, which is the equivalent of Wanderer casting a discharge skill. The skill that triggers the discharge skill will then be used again afterward.

imitation_29.name: Tian Lang: Thunderball
imitation_29.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **2** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **12%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

imitation_29.name: Tian Lang: Thunderclap
imitation_29.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains **1** free dodge attempt, up to **3** attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by **18%** for **8** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

imitation_28.name: Freeze
imitation_28.description: Upon entering battle, gain **1.5%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds . Stack up to **10** times.

imitation_28.name: Icebound
imitation_28.description: Upon entering battle, gain **2.4%** frost ATK boost for **5** seconds every **3** seconds, with up to **10** stacks. Also, gain hyperbody and immunity to control effects while in the Frost Domain.

imitation_27.name: Gnonno: Ripples
imitation_27.description: After **Exploration Team Strike** triggers **Total Berserk**, increase final damage by **12%** for **30** seconds.

imitation_27.name: Gnonno: Tidal Wave
imitation_27.description:
After **Exploration Team Strike** triggers **Total Berserk**, increase final damage by **23%** for **30** seconds.
While diving, increase movement speed by **50%**.

imitation_26.name: Gas (boom!)
imitation_26.description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **8%** for **20** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

imitation_26.name: Gas (boooom!)
imitation_26.description: For every **1** enemy hit by Gas Explosion, increase Clover Cross's damage by **15%** for **20** seconds, stacking up to **2** times.

imitation_24.name: Heartswitch
imitation_24.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by 10% for the entire team. Unstackable.

imitation_24.name: Bless
imitation_24.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by 10% for the entire team. This effect cannot be stacked. Additionally, increase your Max HP by 10%. Each time you successfully use the skill while having hyperbody or more than 50% HP, grant hyperbody to all allies for 8 seconds.

imitation_23.name: Lin: Epiphyllum Glamour
imitation_23.description: Increase epiphyllum explosion damage by **20%**. Reduce all resistance of targets by **7%** upon hit by epiphyllums for **7** seconds. This effect does not stack.

imitation_22.name: Saki Fuwa: Fortitude State
imitation_22.description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%**.

imitation_22.name: Saki Fuwa: Guarding Sword
imitation_22.description: When HP is lower than **70%**, increase all resistance by **40%** with an extra **60%** increased frost resistance. In the state of Silent Flow: After the sword shadow releases Surge and blocks an attack, the teammate with the lowest HP percentage will get 3 block abilities, not including yourself, lasting for **10** seconds. The maximum blocking damage does not exceed **15%** of the teammate's Max HP.

imitation_21.name: Dreamcatcher
imitation_21.description: Increases the flame damage taken by all enemies within **5** meters of Dolly by **8%**. This effect does not stack.

imitation_21.name: Dolly's Domain
imitation_21.description: Increases the flame damage received by all enemies within 5 meters of Dolly by **8%**. Not stackable. Increases flame ATK after throwing Dolly by **12%** for **10** seconds. This effect does not stack.

imitation_20.name: Marc: Next Life
imitation_20.description: When Marc takes lethal damage, prevent his death and activate Rebirth for the next **5** seconds. While Rebirth is activated, Marc taunts nearby enemies and becomes immune to damage, unable to act but recovering **1%** of his Max HP every second and increasing incoming healing effects by **20%**. **10**-minute cooldown. Reduce damage taken from spiny eels and earthcallers by **50%**.

imitation_20.name: Marc: Past Life
imitation_20.description: When Marc takes lethal damage, prevent his death and activate Enlightenment for the next **5** seconds. While Enlightenment is activated, Marc taunts nearby enemies and becomes immune to damage, unable to act but recovering **2%** of his Max HP every second and increasing incoming healing effects by **50%**. **5**-minute cooldown. Reduce damage taken from spiny eels and earthcallers by **50%**.

imitation_18.name: Bai Yuekui: Crescent
imitation_18.description: Upon entering battle, increase Bai Yuekui's volt attack by **21%** for **120** seconds. Effect decays over time. Leaving battle for **5** seconds resets this effect. Deal an additional **50%** damage against spiny eels and earthcallers.

imitation_18.name: Bai Yuekui: Full Moon
imitation_18.description: Upon entering battle, increase Bai Yuekui's volt attack by **33%** for **120** seconds. Effect decays over time. Leaving battle for **5** seconds resets this effect. Deal an additional **50%** damage against spiny eels and earthcallers.

imitation_17.name: Nemesis: Metamorphosis
imitation_17.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **60%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **120%** of ATK.

imitation_17.name: Nemesis: Sublimation
imitation_17.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **100%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **200%** of ATK.

imitation_16.name: Bai Ling: Valor
imitation_16.description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by **8%** for **12** seconds. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

imitation_16.name: Bai Ling: Resoluteness
imitation_16.description: When Bai Ling puts the Glider or the Jetboard away, increase speed by **15%** for **12** seconds. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

imitation_15.name: Hilda: Pedal to the Metal
imitation_15.description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by **7%**.

imitation_15.name: Hilda: Full-speed Drifting
imitation_15.description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by **10%**.

imitation_14.name: Pepper: Revival
imitation_14.description: When Pepper spends satiety to restore HP, increase restoration effect by **100%**.

imitation_14.name: Pepper: Source
imitation_14.description: When Pepper spends satiety to restore HP, increase restoration effect by **200%**.

imitation_13.name: Crow: Loner
imitation_13.description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by **6%** and reduce damage received by **4%**.

imitation_13.name: Crow: Silent Night
imitation_13.description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by **10%** and reduce damage received by **6%**. When Crow enters combat, increase damage dealt by **12%** for **12** seconds.

imitation_12.name: Claudia: Blink
imitation_12.description: Go invisible for **1** second upon dodging.

imitation_12.name: Claudia: Shadow
imitation_12.description: Go invisible for **1.5** seconds upon dodging.

imitation_11.name: Cocoritter: Assistance
imitation_11.description: When Cocoritter uses a support weapon, increase healing effects she inflicts on others and receives by **20%**.

imitation_11.name: Cocoritter: Trust
imitation_11.description: When Cocoritter uses a support weapon, increase healing and healing received by **20%**. And when Cocoritter uses a support-type weapon's discharge skill or weapon skill, increase nearby allies' ATK by **15%** for **5** seconds.

imitation_10.name: Cobalt-B: Lingering Warmth
imitation_10.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **50** to **120** points.

imitation_10.name: Cobalt-B: Sparks
imitation_10.description: After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **90** to **180** points.

imitation_9.name: KING: Coldblooded Swipe
imitation_9.description: Every **7** enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to **8%** of Max HP.

imitation_9.name: KING: Fear Reaper
imitation_9.description: Every **5** enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to **10%** of Max HP.

imitation_8.name: Shiro: Security Alert
imitation_8.description: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by **10%** and physical ATK by an additional **7%** for **8** seconds. Cooldown: **16** seconds.

imitation_8.name: Shiro: Red Alarm
imitation_8.description: When Shiro uses a weapon skill/discharge skill, increase all kinds of ATK by **16%** and physical ATK by an additional **10%** for **8** seconds. Cooldown: **16** seconds.

imitation_7.name: Tsubasa: Rainstorm
imitation_7.description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain **1** stack of Fierce Strike, up to **1** stack per **1** second. Each stack adds **0.5%** ATK, up to **15** stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for **30** seconds.

imitation_7.name: Tsubasa: Raging Waves
imitation_7.description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain **1** stack of Fierce Strike, up to **1** stack per **1** second. Each stack adds **0.6%** ATK, up to **30** stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for **30** seconds.

imitation_6.name: Huma: Fortitude
imitation_6.description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks Ã—**0.4%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks Ã—**0.6%** HP.

imitation_6.name: Huma: Iron Screen
imitation_6.description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks Ã—**0.6%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks Ã—**0.9%** HP.

imitation_5.name: Samir: Trickery
imitation_5.description: Grant **1** stack of Concentration for every **4** seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by **3%**, and can stack up to **4** times. After being hit, Samir loses **1** stack of Concentration, up to **1** stack per **1** second.

imitation_5.name: Samir: Shadow
imitation_5.description: Grant **1** stack of Concentration for every **4** seconds when Samir receives no damage. Each stack increases damage dealt by **4%**, and can stack up to **5** times. After being hit, Samir loses **1** stack of Concentration, up to **1** stack per **2** second.

imitation_4.name: Echo: Uprightness
imitation_4.description: When teamed up with Echo, allies within **10** meters around Echo gain a damage boost of **4%** (excluding Echo).

imitation_4.name: Echo: Determination
imitation_4.description: When teamed up with Echo, allies within **10** meters around Echo gain a damage boost of **6%** (excluding Echo).

imitation_3.name: Meryl: Cool Rose
imitation_3.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **20%**, gain immunity to the frostbitten effect, and reduce duration of being frozen by **50%**.

imitation_3.name: Meryl: Frosted
imitation_3.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **25%**, gain immunity to the frostbite effect, and reduce the duration of being frozen by **50%**. The air around Meryl becomes cold, freezing the water around her.

imitation_2.name: Ene: Fast Mode
imitation_2.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **12%**.

imitation_2.name: Ene: Beyond Limits Mode
imitation_2.description: When Ene swims, climbs, or glides, reduce endurance consumption by **20%**.

imitation_1.name: Zero: Accurate Calculation
imitation_1.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **1.5** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.

imitation_1.name: Zero: Overall Planning
imitation_1.description: When Zero uses a weapon skill, reduce cooldown time for Relics in cooldown by **3** seconds. Can only activate for the same weapon **1** time every **5** seconds.
